0.5.0
-----

- fixed webassets 0.9 and compass

0.4.1
-----

New assets: h5bp-moderm-browsers-2014-05-14 to work only with modern browsers.

It contains:
    * css:
        - normalize 3.0.1
    * js:
        - modernizr-2.8.1
        - jquery-2.1.1
        - respond-1.4.0
0.4.0
-----

- The page.* files are confused
because an application can have several pages, no only one.
They are really the base files, hence they are renamed to base.*

- The assets folder has a README.txt file with documentation of assets folders.
